comments.author: Michael Nitti
comments.comment: Overall wonderful experience. Dealing with such creative minds, along with the platform has been such a breeze

comments.author: hamidpeya
comments.comment: The experience was terrific. I received too many ideas from creative minds and was able to see things from a different perspective. Eventually, we settled on a design that is beautiful, creative, balanced, and lovable at every possible sight.

comments.author: OpenFaceContest
comments.comment: Platform is Super easy to use, the submissions were very creative! CS was very responsive, Great communication and Lots of fantastic benefits! Would definitely work with Atom again.

comments.author: cky8
comments.comment: Everything was top notch. I have no recommendations for improvement. I'm very excited to work with you again in the future. I've already recommended this company to several friends. Thanks for all the support. A++ service.

comments.author: esther
comments.comment: It was absolutely amazing. So many fantastic and highly talented creatives that worked on this. I cannot thank you all enough for participating in what turned out to be a HUGE SUCCESS

comments.author: eddieclayton05
comments.comment: So impressed with the immediate feedback and creativity! Was tough to pick the winner with so many amazing entries. We are extremely happy with our winner!!!

comments.author: tsfouse
comments.comment: It was a FANTASTIC experience. Easy to navigate through and I feel that I had plenty of ideas to choose from. Thank you!
